mapper.select: SELECT R1.ROOM_NUM, R1.ROOM_TYPE, R1.TRADE_TYPE, R1.monthly_payment, R1.monthly_DEPOSIT, R1.jeonse, R1.THUMBNAIL, R2.DESC_TITLE, RB.UPLOAD_DATE FROM ROOM_INFO1 R1, ROOM_INFO2 R2, ROOM_BOARD RB WHERE R1.ROOM_NUM=r2.room_num and R1.ROOM_NUM=rb.room_num and R1.ROOM_NUM=#{rn}
select fav_room.room_num from fav_room where mem_id=#{MEM_ID}
